item.title: ATR Data from Interaction of kerogen with brine-saturated supercritical carbon dioxide (CO2) and its implications to geologic carbon sequestration and enhanced oil/gas recovery (2018)
item.description: Abstract The dataset covers Attenuated Total Reflectance (ATR) measurements taken from altered kerogen in shales from the Woodford formation. The ATR measurements were taken after the samples were run through supercritical CO2 alteration experiments in a brine solution. Access Points https://www.sciencebase.gov/catalog/item/5d234766e4b0941bde64f1ac?community=Energy+Resources+Program
